_source.text: [ 114 ] Such claims were widely believed not only in Germany but abroad, with the British military historian Captain Basil Liddell Hart writing that "the German Army in the field on the whole observed the rules of war better than in 1914-18".

text: historian **Captain** **Basil** Liddell Hart writing that "the German Army in the field on the whole observed the rules of war **better** **than** in 1914-18".
